param.name: HOST
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Host]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Server IP or name, do not use add slashes or backward slashes]

param.name: PATH
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Uri]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Path to the share and complementary URI if necessary]

param.name: DOMAIN
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Domain]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Default domain to use with session credentials. The domain name ends with '/' or '\' depend on your system. Example: MyDomain\ or YourDomain/. Default is /]

param.name: CHMOD_VALUE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[File Creation Mask]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Optionnaly apply a chmod operation. Value must be numeric, like 0777, 0644, etc.]

global_param.name: SMBCLIENT
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Smbclient]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Path to smbclient executable, considered to be in the path by default.]

global_param.name: SMB_PATH_TMP
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Path Tmp]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[OS Path Temporary if not the default one]

global_param.name: SMB_ENABLE_ZIP
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Enable Zip]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Enable zip creation for repositories using Samba access. Make sure that you are using a very fast network, otherwise it will be very long!]

global_param.name: DEFAULT_METASOURCES
global_param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default Metasources]
global_param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Comma separated list of metastore and meta plugins, that will be automatically applied to all repositories created with this driver]
